listitem.para: Extract the '*.fmt' files from MKS into the DESTINATION 'sam/fmt/template' directory.
Generate template and / or page files from existing '.fmt' (page) files using the following command: -> makeallpages -b y y <spacecraft> <processor1> <processor2>, etc.

para.emphasis: Use "" in place of the spacecraft if you want it omitted.

listitem.para: Extract the *.fmt files from MKS into the 'sam/fmt' directory.
Start or re-start ASIST to verify that the pages you just created will display.

detaileddescription.para: Prev: Creating the Command and Telemetry Databases Up To: Building the Ground Database and Pages
